english.segment1: Decide nothing. I depend for everything. You don't need me. You don't need anything
english.segment2: Remedies were bankrupt like the rest of these
english.segment3: Forget what they told you - there's no self-help. Taken by Your glory - don't look back now
english.segment4: I don't care who I am, I lost that interest. There are no mirrors deep enough to meet my needs
